Add your providers View your net worth Manage your accounts Manage your spending Manage your bills Transfer funds
Add your account providers like banks, share brokers and other financial institutions where you have your credit cards, savings, deposits, loans, investments etc. Add your providers to view your financial net worth and breakdown across various categories Add your providers to view the summary and detailed information about your accounts, such as balances, transaction history, cash-flow graphs etc.
"Categorise your transactions automatically, view your historic and future predicted spending patterns, setup spending budgets " "and get notified on significant events"
Better manage your bills by adding your utility, telecoms and other online billers and view your monthly outstanding balances and payments Transfer funds between your accounts with ease by using the eWise Money transfer funds feature. This feature is available for selected institutions and allows you to transfer funds to your own accounts or predefined beneficiaries at those institutions
PREMIUM ANNUAL 99.90 USD MONTHLY 9.90 USD
Buy now Try (10 days free trial)

"Press OK to add Provider. Press CANCEL to make changes \n\n" "You may continue to use the app while we retrieve the account" "details in the background. The accounts will be displayed after" " we have retrieved them successfully"
Add Billers
"Please enter valid credentials for user identification and password fields"
"Add your credentials to access online accounts from %1$s. " "We ensure that we safeguard the confidentiality of your provider credentials by " "encrypting these credentials and safely storing them in your device's Personal Data Vault (PDV). " "The credentials in your PDV cannot be accessed by any third-parties including ourselves, " "they can only be used by this app to access your online %2$s account directly from this device."

"1. You should only edit provider credentials if\n" "(a) credentials are not found in this device, or\n" "(b) your password or other security credentials have changed.\n\n" "2. The credentials will not be validated at the time of saving credentials. They will be validated the next time you sync your provider.\n\n" "3. If your userid has changed, please remove and add the provider again."
